name: Holoclick (Hololive Popcat)
description:
HoloClick (Hololive Popcat)

This can also be played on the site below.
https://hololive.click

This is Hololive Popcat.
Cheer on your favorite member with a touch.
Compete in real-time rankings with people from all over the world.

How to play : Just Touch
Please subscribe to My YouTube : Ollieve (Hololive Clips)
Please enjoy playing!
